instructions: Download and install the Nintendo Switch Online app on an Android or iOS device. Launch the app and sign in with your Nintendo account. (If you don't have an account, you'll need to register for a Nintendo account .) Launch the game you want to play using the same Nintendo account and enter a mode that supports voice chat. On your smart device, tap Start when asked if you want to begin your voice chat session. The app will create a lobby others can join as you play online. That's it!
